symbols.name: sap.fe.macros
symbols.description:
OData Version 4 Macros (XMLPreprocessor Plugins) for UI5 XML Views

All the macros below are not controls. They will only create XML snippets during XMLPreprocessing. That generated XML will only use real controls.

Prerequisites for using macros

  • The sap.ui.core.util.XMLPreprocessor must be used for view creation
  • The view or fragment that uses the macros must define an xml namespace and require this macro library using template:require. E.g.: 
    <mvc:View xmlns="sap.m"
	  xmlns:macro="sap.fe.macros"
	  template:require="{
	    macroLibrary: 'sap/fe/macros/macroLibrary'
	  }"
/>

nodes.name: sap.fe.macros.Chart
nodes.description: Macro for creating a Chart based on provided OData v4 metadata.

nodes.name: sap.fe.macros.Contact
nodes.description: Macro for creating a Contact based on provided OData v4 metadata.

nodes.description: Macro for creating a FilterBar based on provided OData v4 metadata.

nodes.description: Macro for creating a FilterField based on provided OData v4 metadata.

nodes.name: sap.fe.macros.Form
nodes.description: Macro for creating a Form based on provided OData v4 metadata.

nodes.name: sap.fe.macros.MetadataContext
nodes.description: The context definition mapping a source context to a target name.

nodes.name: sap.fe.macros.MicroChart
nodes.description:
Usage example: 

<macro:MicroChart
  metadataContexts="
    {model: 'someModel', path: '/somePath', name: 'entitySet'}
    {model: 'someModel', path: '/somePath', name: 'chartAnnotation'}
  " />
  OR
		collection="{entitySet>}"
		chartAnnotation="{chartAnnotation>}"

Annotations evaluated by this macro

  • Target chartAnnotation
    • Namespace com.sap.vocabularies.UI.v1
      • Term Chart
        Chart Annotations
  • Target entitySet
    • Namespace Org.OData.Capabilities.V1
      • Term FilterRestrictions/NonFilterableProberties
        The filter field will not be created, if it is mentioned in a collection of NonFilterableProperties of the entitySet

Macro for creating a MicroChart based on provided OData v4 metadata.

Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

nodes.name: sap.fe.macros.TraceInfo
nodes.description:
Fiori elements trace information

Once traces is switched, information about macros and controls that are processed during xml preprocessing ( @see sap.ui.core.util.XMLPreprocessor) will be collected within this singleton

nodes.name: sap.fe.macros.ValueHelp
nodes.description: Macro for creating a ValueHelp based on provided OData v4 metadata.

symbols.title: namespace sap.fe.macros

symbols.name: sap.fe.macros.Chart
symbols.description: Macro for creating a Chart based on provided OData v4 metadata.

properties.name: chartType
properties.description: The chart type (Column, Bar, etc.) - if not specified chartType is picked from the metadata information

properties.name: collection
properties.description: Metadata path to the entitySet or navigationProperty

properties.name: data
properties.description: Binding information for chart - if not specified it is created from the metadata information

properties.name: header
properties.description: The header text of the chart - if not specified it is picked up from the metadata information

properties.name: height
properties.description: The height of the chart

properties.name: id
properties.description: ID of the chart

properties.name: presentation
properties.description: Metadata path to the presentation (UI.Chart w or w/o qualifier)

properties.name: selectionMode
properties.description: Specifies the selection mode

properties.name: width
properties.description: The width of the chart

symbols.title: class sap.fe.macros.Chart

symbols.name: sap.fe.macros.Contact
symbols.description:
Macro for creating a Contact based on provided OData v4 metadata.

Usage example: 

<macro:Contact
  displayHeader=true/false
  metadataContexts="
    {model: 'SomeModel', path: '', name: 'contact'}, {model: 'SomeModel', path: '', name: 'dataField'}
  " />

Annotations evaluated by this macro

  • Target property
    • Namespace https://wiki.scn.sap.com/wiki/display/EmTech/OData+4.0+Vocabularies+-+SAP+Communication#ContactType
      • Term fn
        The Full name for the contact
    • Namespace https://wiki.scn.sap.com/wiki/display/EmTech/OData+4.0+Vocabularies+-+SAP+Communication#ContactType
      • Term title
        The title of the contact
    • Namespace https://wiki.scn.sap.com/wiki/display/EmTech/OData+4.0+Vocabularies+-+SAP+Communication#ContactType
      • Term role
        The role of the contact
    • Namespace https://wiki.scn.sap.com/wiki/display/EmTech/OData+4.0+Vocabularies+-+SAP+Communication#ContactType
      • Term org
        The organization of the contact
    • Namespace https://wiki.scn.sap.com/wiki/display/EmTech/OData+4.0+Vocabularies+-+SAP+Communication#ContactType
      • Term photo
        The photo of the contact
    • Namespace https://wiki.scn.sap.com/wiki/display/EmTech/OData+4.0+Vocabularies+-+SAP+Communication#ContactType
      • Term title
        The title of the contact
    • Namespace https://wiki.scn.sap.com/wiki/display/EmTech/OData+4.0+Vocabularies+-+SAP+Communication#ContactType
      • Term adr
        Array of addresses of the contact
    • Namespace https://wiki.scn.sap.com/wiki/display/EmTech/OData+4.0+Vocabularies+-+SAP+Communication#ContactType
      • Term email
        Array of email addresses of the contact
    • Namespace https://wiki.scn.sap.com/wiki/display/EmTech/OData+4.0+Vocabularies+-+SAP+Communication#ContactType
      • Term tel
        Array of telephone numbers of the contact

properties.name: displayHeader
properties.description: Flag to check whether the Contact is present in Display header or not

properties.name: id
properties.description: Id for the contact

symbols.title: class sap.fe.macros.Contact

symbols.name: sap.fe.macros.FilterBar
symbols.description:
Macro for creating a FilterBar based on provided OData v4 metadata.

Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

properties.name: idPrefix
properties.description: Prefix added to the generated ID of the filter field. Default: FF

properties.name: vhIdPrefix
properties.description: Prefix added to the generated ID of the value help used for the filter field. Default: FFVH

symbols.title: typedef sap.fe.macros.FilterBar

symbols.name: sap.fe.macros.FilterField
symbols.description:
Macro for creating a FilterField based on provided OData v4 metadata.

Usage example: 

<macro:FilterField
  idPrefix="SomePrefix"
  vhIdPrefix="SomeVhPrefix"
  metadataContexts="
    {model: 'SomeModel', path: '/someEntitySet', name: 'entitySet'},
    {model: 'SomeModel', path: '/someEntitySet/@com.sap.vocabularies.UI.v1.SelectionFields/0/$PropertyPath', name: 'property'}
  " />

Annotations evaluated by this macro

  • Target property
    • Namespace com.sap.vocabularies.Common.v1
      • Term Label
        The label for the filter field
    • Namespace com.sap.vocabularies.UI.v1
      • Term Hidden
        The filter field will not be created
      • Term HiddenFilter
        The filter field will not be created
  • Target entitySet
    • Namespace Org.OData.Capabilities.V1
      • Term FilterRestrictions/NonFilterableProberties
        The filter field will not be created, if it is mentioned in a collection of NonFilterableProperties of the entitySet

properties.name: _valueList
properties.description: Temporary workaround only path to valuelist

properties.name: entitySet
properties.description: Metadata path to the entity set

properties.name: idPrefix
properties.description: Prefix added to the generated ID of the filter field

properties.name: property
properties.description: Metadata path to the property

properties.name: vhIdPrefix
properties.description: Prefix added to the generated ID of the value help used for the filter field

annotations.name: hidden
annotations.description:
Defines that a property is not displayed. As a consequence the filter field will not be created by the macro In contrast to HiddenFilter, a property annotated with Hidden is not used as a filter.

Example in OData V4 notation with hidden ProductPictureURL

    <Annotations Target="ProductPictureURL" >
        <Annotation Term="com.sap.vocabularies.UI.v1.Hidden"/>
    </Annotations>

For more information, see OData v4 Annotations

Since: 1.67.

annotations.name: hiddenFilter
annotations.description:
Defines that a property is not displayed as a filter. As a consequence the filter field will not be created by the macro

Example in OData V4 notation with invisible, filterable property "LocationName" 

    <Annotations Target="LocationName" >
        <Annotation Term="com.sap.vocabularies.UI.v1.HiddenFilter"/>
    </Annotations>

For more information, see OData v4 Annotations

Since: 1.67.

symbols.title: class sap.fe.macros.FilterField

symbols.name: sap.fe.macros.Form
symbols.description:
Macro for creating a Form based on provided OData v4 metadata.

Usage example: 

<macro:Form
 id="SomeID"
 entitySet="{entitySet>}"
 facet="{facet>}"
 formTitle="someTitle"
 editMode="Editable"
 createMode="true"
 useFormContainerLabels="true"
 partOfPreview="true"
 onChange=".handlers.onFieldValueChange"
/>

Annotations evaluated by this macro

  • Target property
    • Namespace com.sap.vocabularies.UI.v1
      • Term CollectionFacet
        Collection Facet
      • Term ReferenceFacet
        Reference Facet
      • Term PartOfPreview
        This Facet and all included Facets are part of the preview
      • Term Hidden
        The filter field will not be created

properties.name: createMode
properties.description: Control the create mode of the form

properties.name: editMode
properties.description: Control the edit mode of the form

properties.name: entitySet
properties.description: mandatory context to the EntitySet

properties.name: facet
properties.description: Metadata path to the facet

properties.name: formTitle
properties.description: Title of the form

properties.name: id
properties.description: ID of the form

properties.name: useFormContainerLabels
properties.description: Control the rendering of the form container labels

symbols.title: class sap.fe.macros.Form

symbols.description: The context definition mapping a source context to a target name.

properties.name: model
properties.description: The source model

properties.name: path
properties.description: The path of the source model

properties.name: name
properties.description: The target name

symbols.title: typedef sap.fe.macros.MetadataContext

symbols.name: sap.fe.macros.MicroChart
symbols.description:
Usage example: 

<macro:MicroChart
  metadataContexts="
    {model: 'someModel', path: '/somePath', name: 'entitySet'}
    {model: 'someModel', path: '/somePath', name: 'chartAnnotation'}
  " />
  OR
		collection="{entitySet>}"
		chartAnnotation="{chartAnnotation>}"

Annotations evaluated by this macro

  • Target chartAnnotation
    • Namespace com.sap.vocabularies.UI.v1
      • Term Chart
        Chart Annotations
  • Target entitySet
    • Namespace Org.OData.Capabilities.V1
      • Term FilterRestrictions/NonFilterableProberties
        The filter field will not be created, if it is mentioned in a collection of NonFilterableProperties of the entitySet

Macro for creating a MicroChart based on provided OData v4 metadata.

Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

properties.name: renderLabels
properties.description: To control rendering of Title, Subtitle and Currency Labels. Default: true

properties.name: groupId
properties.description: To group the requests from the Micro Chart. Default: ""

properties.name: title
properties.description: for the micro chart. If not provided, title from chart annotations is considered. Rendered only if 'renderLabels' is not .. Default: ""

properties.name: description
properties.description: for the micro chart. If not provided, description from chart annotations is considered. Rendered only if 'renderLabels' is not . Default: ""

properties.name: metadataContexts
properties.description:
A collection of provided metadata contexts. Requires the following contexts:

  • collection entitySet or navigationProperty
  • chartAnnotation The context to the chart annotations.

symbols.title: typedef sap.fe.macros.MicroChart

symbols.name: sap.fe.macros.TraceInfo
symbols.description:
Fiori elements trace information

Once traces is switched, information about macros and controls that are processed during xml preprocessing ( @see sap.ui.core.util.XMLPreprocessor) will be collected within this singleton

experimental.text:
This module is only for experimental use!
This is only a POC and maybe deleted

methods.name: sap.fe.macros.TraceInfo.getTraceInfo

returnValue.description: Object for one trace info / Array for all

methods.description:
Returns the globally stored trace information for the macro or control marked with the given id.

Returns all trace information if no id is specified

Structure for a macro
{
	macro: '', //name of macro
	metaDataContexts: [ //Properties of type sap.ui.model.Context
		{
			name: '', //context property name / key
			path: '', //from oContext.getPath()
		}
	],
	properties: { // Other properties which become part of {this>}
		property1: value,
		property2: value
	}
	viewInfo: {
		viewInfo: {} // As specified in view or fragement creation
	},
	traceID: this.index, //ID for this trace information,
	macroInfo: {
		macroID: index, // traceID of this macro (redundant for macros)
		parentMacroID, index // traceID of the parent macro (if it has a parent)
	}
}
Structure for a control
{
	control: '', //control class
	properties: { // Other properties which become part of {this>}
		property1: {
			originalValue: '', //Value before templating
			resolvedValue: '' //Value after templating
		}
	}
	contexts: { //Models and Contexts used during templating
		// Model or context name used for this control
		modelName1: { // For ODataMetaModel
			path1: {
				path: '', //absolut path within metamodel
				data: '', //data of path unless type Object
			}
		modelName2: {
			// for other model types
			{
				property1: value,
				property2: value
			}
			// In case binding cannot be resolved -> mark as runtime binding
			// This is not always true, e.g. in case the path is metamodelpath
			{
				"bindingFor": "Runtime"
			}
		}
	},
	viewInfo: {
		viewInfo: {} // As specified in view or fragement creation
	},
	macroInfo: {
		macroID: index, // traceID of the macro that created this control
		parentMacroID, index // traceID of the macro's parent macro
	},
	traceID: this.index //ID for this trace information
}

methods.name: sap.fe.macros.TraceInfo.isTraceInfoActive
methods.description: Returns true if trace info collection is active

methods.name: sap.fe.macros.TraceInfo.traceMacroCalls
methods.description: Adds information about the processing of one macro to the collection

symbols.title: namespace sap.fe.macros.TraceInfo

symbols.name: sap.fe.macros.ValueHelp
symbols.description:
Macro for creating a ValueHelp based on provided OData v4 metadata.

Usage example: 

<macro:ValueHelp
  idPrefix="SomePrefix"
  entitySet="{someEntitySet>}"
  property="{someProperty>}"
  conditionModel="$filter"
  />

Annotations evaluated by this macro

  • @com.sap.vocabularies.Common.v1.ValueListReferences
  • @com.sap.vocabularies.Common.v1.ValueListMapping
  • @com.sap.vocabularies.Common.v1.ValueList

  • @com.sap.vocabularies.Common.v1.Text
  • @com.sap.vocabularies.UI.v1.HiddenFilter
  • @com.sap.vocabularies.UI.v1.Hidden

properties.name: conditionModel
properties.description: Indicator whether the field help is for a filter field

properties.name: entitySet
properties.description: Metadata path to the entity set

properties.name: idPrefix
properties.description: Prefix added to the generated ID of the value help

properties.name: property
properties.description: Metadata path to the property

symbols.title: class sap.fe.macros.ValueHelp

nodes.name: sap.fe.macros
nodes.description:
OData Version 4 Macros (XMLPreprocessor Plugins) for UI5 XML Views

All the macros below are not controls. They will only create XML snippets during XMLPreprocessing. That generated XML will only use real controls.

Prerequisites for using macros

  • The sap.ui.core.util.XMLPreprocessor must be used for view creation
  • The view or fragment that uses the macros must define an xml namespace and require this macro library using template:require. E.g.: 
    <mvc:View xmlns="sap.m"
	  xmlns:macro="sap.fe.macros"
	  template:require="{
	    macroLibrary: 'sap/fe/macros/macroLibrary'
	  }"
/>
